name: Time Of GoodBying (Proof Of Concept)
description:
You must approach as many people as possible before your time is up. You have one minute left on earth,  make sure you say goodbye in my game "Time of Goodbying"!

Developer's note:

This game is so early in development. I literally made this prototype in just over an hour, and then spent a little time adjusting a couple of things here and there and getting logos/ title stuff done. This is pretty quick (and rushed), but as the title says this is a proof of concept. The game will change overtime (if it is worked on) and is not playable at the moment. Once a little more polish is added and a few more things have been implemented it will be available to download. (hopefully soon!). Anything can change about the game( even the mechanics and game objective might change overtime), so what is seen is not a final representation of gameplay.

The aim of the game here is to try and come into contact with the people around you (represented by blue squares in a screenshot, they flash around the screen but you can't tell from a picture) before the one minute timer runs out. I am hoping to get a little more design into this (both gameplay and art) in the future (if I continue to work on this, which I probably should). Stay tuned to see more out of this, and thank you for your time!

-LebbyFoxx
